name: ReachTheShelter
description:
This game is for weekly game jam - week 152.

I made this game for my very first game jam. This is my second game in my life made with unity.

I wanted to add a lot more in this game but for some reason couldn't do it on time.

however I managed to make a playable version anyhow.

I had a lot of fun making it. I am just a beginner so please give me some feedback to improve.
